title: i need help pls
body: i cant use a ward skin that i bought :| pls i need help

replies.body: We're currently looking into a display issue where some ward skins aren't selectable.  They are unlocked on your account, so no worries!  We'll be providing updates on our[ status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  I hope that helps clear things up!
